pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========anykeystore===========A generic interface wrapping multiple different backends to provide aconsistent key-value storage API. This library is intended to be used by otherlibraries that require some form of generic storage.Usage=====:: from anykeystore import create_store store = create_store('sqla', url='postgres+psycopg2://bob@localhost/mydb') settings = { 'mystore.store': 'sqla', 'mystore.url': 'mysql://bob@localhost/mydb', } store = create_store_from_settings(settings, prefix='mystore.')Supported Backends==================- memory- sqlalchemy requires: sqlalchemy- mongodb requires: pymongo- redis requires: redis-py- memcached requires: python-memcached, or python3-memcached
